price: deren Zufluchtsort wird das (Höllen)feuer sein für das, was sie erworben haben.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
